Description.Text:
Property Location
With a stay at Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix-en-Provence Centre MGallery, you'll be centrally located in Aix-en-Provence, steps from Place des Quatre-Dauphins and minutes from Granet Museum. This 4-star hotel is within close proximity of Cours Mirabeau and La Rotonde - Place General Charles De Gaulle.

Rooms
Make yourself at home in one of the 134 individually decorated guestrooms, featuring iPod docking stations and LCD televisions. Complimentary wired and wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming provides entertainment. Private bathrooms with bathtubs or showers feature complimentary toiletries and hair dryers. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks.

Rec, Spa, Premium Amenities
Take advantage of recreation opportunities such as an outdoor pool, or other amenities including complimentary wireless Internet access and concierge services. This hotel also features babysitting/childcare, a television in the lobby, and tour/ticket assistance.

Dining
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are served on weekdays for a fee.

Business, Other Amenities
Featured amenities include a 24-hour business center, a computer station, and express check-in. Planning an event in Aix-en-Provence? This hotel has 2476 square feet (230 square meters) of space consisting of conference space and meeting rooms.


Pets allowed Check-in time starts at 2 PM Check-out time is noon
Grab a bite to eat at the hotel's restaurant, which features a bar, or stay in and take advantage of 24-hour room service. Quench your thirst with your favorite drink at a bar/lounge. Cooked-to-order breakfasts are served on weekdays for a fee.
Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on hotel policy.
Government-issued photo identification and a credit card or cash deposit are required at check-in for incidental charges.
Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges. Special requests cannot be guaranteed.

Distances are calculated in a straight line from the property's location to the point of interest or attraction, and may not reflect actual travel distance.

Distances are displayed to the nearest 0.1 mile and kilometer.

The nearest airports are:
Aix-en-Provence (QXB-Aix en Provence TGV Train Station) - 13.2 km / 8.2 mi
Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence) - 20.3 km / 12.6 mi

The preferred airport for Grand Hôtel Roi René Aix-en-Provence Centre MGallery is Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence).

You must present a photo ID when checking in. Your credit card is charged at the time you book. Bed type and smoking preferences are not guaranteed.Your reservation is prepaid and is guaranteed for late arrival. The total charge includes all room charges and taxes, as well as fees for access and booking. Any incidental charges such as parking, phone calls, and room service will be handled directly between you and the property.

The preferred airport for Grand Hotel Roi Rene Aix en Provence - MGallery Collection is Marseille (MRS-Marseille - Provence) - 20.3 km / 12.6 mi.
